actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution prohibiting trade and cultural and educational exchanges between the United States and the Soviet Union until such time as Anatoly Shcharansky and Aleksandr Ginsburg are set free and the Soviet Union otherwise meets its commitments under the Helsinki Final Act.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: States that until Anatoly Shcharansky and Aleksandr Ginsburg are freed and the Soviet Union meets its commitment under the Helsinki Final Act there shall be no trade or cultural and educational exchanges between the United States and the Soviet Union.

titles.title: A resolution prohibiting trade and cultural and educational exchanges between the United States and the Soviet Union until such time as Anatoly Shcharansky and Aleksandr Ginsburg are set free and the Soviet Union otherwise meets its commitments under the Helsinki Final Act.
